comment: Great guy, very nice. Not so good a teacher though. Reads straight from the book and power points everyday. Test are rediculously hard too.
SUCKS! totally lost all the time
Exactly what the guy beneath me said. Couldn't agree more.

nice guy, bad teacher. the class was horrible..he is very unorganized and he is very indecisive.class is really boring-he reads straight from the book. tests are very hard and the study guides are completely different from the stuff on the test. it takes forever to get grades back.

sooo boring. He doesn't take attendance which is good, but when you do go all he does is read from the book. His test are really hard. He's very un-organized it seems. I'm not sure how I will do in his class. His participation grade is 5% but it consists of like 10 things, sucks.
Somebody tell me about this teacher! I need to know something.
